sn54.4:1.1: “Anapanassati, bhikkhave, bhavita bahulikata mahapphala hoti mahanisamsa.
sn54.4:1.2: Katham bhavita ca, bhikkhave, anapanassati katham bahulikata mahapphala hoti mahanisamsa?
sn54.4:1.3: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu arannagato va rukkhamulagato va sunnagaragato va nisidati pallankam abhujitva ujum kayam panidhaya parimukham satim upatthapetva.
sn54.4:1.6: Evam bhavita kho, bhikkhave, anapanassati evam bahulikata mahapphala hoti mahanisamsa.
sn54.4:1.7: Evam bhavitaya kho, bhikkhave, anapanassatiya evam bahulikataya dvinnam phalanam annataram phalam patikankham—
sn54.4:1.8: dittheva dhamme anna, sati va upadisese anagamita”ti.
